channel.title: Finalpk - New PK server undergoing major improvements
channel.description:
Server undergoing major revamp will be back soon, bigger and better than ever before
Please go to: http://final-pk.org/index.php to find out more information

item.source: Finalpk - New PK server undergoing major improvements

item.title: Finalpk - New PK server undergoing major improvements
item.dc:creator: @Final-Pk Final-Pk
item.description:
@Final-Pk wrote:

Hi guys,

I have now fully re written edge, updates a few things such as pking info ( F2 To show hits, prayer and what combat mod you are using.) i’ve removed a lot of npcs that were not needed from edge to make space for a staking area. Thanks for your co-operation guys.

EDIT: working on a full re write for the f2p wilderness as we speak and going to remove zombies from edge to adapt to staking ecnonomy

Read full topic
item.source: Finalpk - New PK server undergoing major improvements

item.title: Finalpk - New PK server undergoing major improvements
item.dc:creator: @l0w_archer l0w archer
item.description:
@l0w_archer wrote:

Few people now have rune and flats, Did not take me long after a few updates were made, the population is still up and down but in all fairness this game seriously has some potential. Just needs a few more decent pkers to join.

Read full topic
item.source: Finalpk - New PK server undergoing major improvements

item.title: Finalpk - New PK server undergoing major improvements
item.dc:creator: @Final-Pk Final-Pk
item.description:
@Final-Pk wrote:

Thank you, Same to you. Next time please PM me is people are doing this and i will find out. Like i say i have not asked anyone nor have i done it myself i assure you of this.

item.source: Finalpk - New PK server undergoing major improvements

item.title: Finalpk - New PK server undergoing major improvements
item.dc:creator: @Aleka Aleka
item.description:
@Aleka wrote:

[quote=“stEps, post:10, topic:548531”][quote author=waj link=topic=667443.msg4464122#msg4464122 date=1419090079]

Thanks for spamming my server with your off topic posts advertising your crappy server. I added your email address to the NAMBLA,tranny,BDSM,Beastility and “watersports” mailing lists have fun.

Yeah because I bet the owner went out of his way to do such thing :palm:
[/quote]
Aleka co owner of his server goes out of his way to do this to other people as he did it to me and my server. Don’t mind this guy he is just sad that no one likes him. He thinks he knows it all when he can’t fix anything on his own. He is just a ball of negative rolling around this place.

Good luck with your server bud.[/quote]

@waj
You would be surprised it wouldn’t be the first time.

@stEps
I didn’t touch your server. I don’t like you, but I wouldn’t waste my time spamming a server that I could careless about. The only reason I did this was because our forum was spammed yesterday as well by another server. With that said I wouldn’t go out of my way to spam your whole site joking around on forums with you is different then attacking your site with adverts.

@Final-pk Well who ever it was I hope they enjoy the mail I guess. Good luck with your server.

Edit:Spelling, etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Finalpk - New PK server undergoing major improvements

item.title: Finalpk - New PK server undergoing major improvements
item.dc:creator: @Final-Pk Final-Pk
item.description:
@Final-Pk wrote:

thank you stEps appreciate it i hope your server goes well :), I can assure you that i have not spammed your server with anything at all, considering i have only just opened my server the last thing i need is enemies and more problems whilst trying to build a steady population. Players choose which server they go on and nothing else can change that, If you check my forums i can also assure i do not even offer hand outs to advertise my server, I’ve asked in game what forums player could advise advertisements and that’s my very furthest i have attempted to advertise at the moment as i was busy fixing bugs, changing domains and updating the server to what players suggested. I have no time at the moment to be logging onto other peoples servers and advertising my own when i could spend more time doing that on forums and not having this abuse…

Read full topic

Good luck with your server bud.

item.title: Finalpk - New PK server undergoing major improvements
item.dc:creator: @Final-Pk Final-Pk
item.description:
@Final-Pk wrote:

Was down for 30 seconds for an update mate

Territory and clan wars works exactly as they should, And we should be moving to better name and more efficient domain within a few hours.

Thanks guys.

EDIT: Just updated a lot of things, including some suggestions from players in game, Thank you for joining players who already have.

Read full topic

item.source: Finalpk - New PK server undergoing major improvements

item.title: Finalpk - New PK server undergoing major improvements
item.dc:creator: @l0w_archer l0w archer
item.description:
@l0w_archer wrote:

Seems okay, just the obvious reason of not being very populated but as its only 12 hours old you would expect that. i’ll see how it develops as the next couple of weeks go on.

EDIT: Seems reasonable enough exp for a pk server, not extremely hard you basically collect coins and weapons drops and buy whats needed, you can afk from 20 minutes into training anywyas. nobody has rune yet from what i’ve seen, Seems to be full addy and addy 2h bought from shops.

Read full topic
